sentence.Network_en: Twist the string carefully around the second stem with the other hand.
sentence.Network_cn: 用另外一只手小心地把细绳缠绕到第二根茎上。

sentence.Network_en: Cut them off cleanly through the stem just below the node.
sentence.Network_cn: 就从茎节下面，沿茎干把它们全砍掉。

sentence.Network_en: The stinging nettle has a square stem and little hairs.
sentence.Network_cn: 荨麻长有四方茎和细小茸毛。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 2006年8月13日 -  stem-winder 机械表 stem-winding 以转柄上发条的 stemma 家谱 stemmata 家谱 stemmed 有茎的 stemware 器皿 stench 恶臭 stencil paper 蜡纸 stencil.

derivation.yuyuan_name: sense 1 from the notion of ‘winding up’ or causing a lively reaction from those listening

means.word_mean: 1. a watch that is wound by turning a knob at the stem
